name: Bytedance Seedream V4 Image Editor Kie AI
description:
Tool for editing and combining images using the ByteDance Seedream V4 model via the Kie.ai API.
Accepts up to 10 images, and creates up to 6 images.
Pricing (as of November 2025): ~$0.0175 per image.
Get your API key at https://kie.ai
author: @@official.shinkai

api_key.description: Required API key for kie.ai API authentication

max_duration.description: Optional maximum duration in seconds to wait for task completion. Default: 300 (equal 5 minutes)

polling_interval.description: Optional interval in seconds for polling the task status (how often to check if image generation is complete). Default: 5

image_size.description: Optional image size. Must be one of 'square', 'square_hd', 'portrait_4_3', 'portrait_3_2', 'portrait_16_9', 'landscape_4_3', 'landscape_3_2', 'landscape_16_9', 'landscape_21_9'. Defaults to None (omit for API default)

prompt.description: The text prompt describing how to edit or combine the image(s). Max length : 5000 characters.

filename.description: Optional base filename for the created image(s) (without extension). Defaults to None (uses task_id)

max_images.description: Optional max number of images to generates. Must be 1-6. Defaults to 1. You should also state the exact number of images you want in the prompt so both settings align.

seed.description: Optional seed for reproducible generation. Default None, a random seed is chosen.

output_format.description: Optional format for the created image(s), must be 'png' or 'jpeg'. Defaults to 'png'.

image_resolution.description: Optional image resolution. Must be one of '1K', '2K', '4K'. Defaults to '2K'

input_image_paths.description: Required list of local full paths to input images for editing, up to 10; Accepted types: .jpeg, .png, and .webp

saved_images_paths.description: List of local paths for successfully downloaded images

status.description: Status of the operation, e.g., 'success', 'partial_success', or error messages

task_id.description: The task ID from the API

temporary_image_urls.description: List of temporary image URLs from the API
